translation.en: -I gotta say, I learned from the master. -Hey, well, don't celebrate yet.
translation.zh:
-我必须说，我从大师身上学习
-先不要庆祝

translation.en: We still got more work to do. All right, I'm gonna wait for you outside.
translation.zh:
我们还有很多功夫要做
好，我在外面等你

translation.en: Can you believe this zipper already broke?
translation.zh: 你能相信这拉链已经坏了吗？

translation.en: Mrs. Harris, can I talk to you?
translation.zh: 哈里斯太太，可以和你谈一会吗？

translation.en: -I'll get the thing. -Listen, I may be partial here...
translation.zh:
-我去拿工具
-听好，我可能是有偏爱

translation.en: ...but I just wanna say you have put on the perfect wedding.
translation.zh: 但是我要说你的婚礼真是很完美

translation.en: Perfect wedding? The zipper on my $8000 dress is broken...
translation.zh: 完美婚礼？我的八千块礼服的拉链坏了

translation.en: ...the groomsmen are accosting my bridesmaids...
translation.zh: 伴郎搭讪我的伴娘

translation.en: ...my grandmother's burned, my dad's knee is shredded...
translation.zh:
我的奶奶从头到脚被火烧
我爸的膝盖伤了

translation.en: ...and don't even get me started on the salad dressing.
translation.zh: 更别让我提起沙拉酱

translation.en: But at least you have Doug. True love conquers all.
translation.zh: 但至少你有道格，真爱是无敌的

translation.en: True love? Please. I'm just sick of dating assholes.
translation.zh: 真爱？拜托，我只是厌倦了和混蛋约会

translation.en: Doug is a good guy, he's good family material.
translation.zh: 道格是好男人，他是好家庭的材料

translation.en: What can I say? I'm a girl that's used to a certain kind of lifestyle...
translation.zh:
我能说什么？我是一个习惯了
某种生活方式的女孩

translation.en: ...and Doug can give me that kind of lifestyle.
translation.zh: 道格能给我那种生活方式

translation.en: So I've gotta go.
translation.zh: 所以，我得走了

translation.en: -Bud, you waiting on me? -Yeah. Yes. Yes.
translation.zh:
-朋友，你在等我吗？
-是的

translation.en: -Let's get back out there, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我们回去外面，好吗？
-好

translation.en: -Time for the first dance. -Yes, it is.
translation.zh:
-是时候跳第一支舞了
-是的

translation.en: Will the rest of the wedding party please join the happy couple?
translation.zh: 其他人可以加入这对开心的新人吗？

translation.en: So who are you really?
translation.zh: 你到底是什么人？

translation.en: I'm not sure I know what you mean by that.
translation.zh: 我不明白你什么意思

translation.en: There has just been some questionable behavior over the last couple of days.
translation.zh: 过去几天有一些可疑的行为

translation.en: Like you setting my grandmother on fire.
translation.zh: 例如你放火烧奶奶

translation.en: The secret military codes.
translation.zh: 秘密军事代号

translation.en: "Kitchen cabinets."
translation.zh: “厨房柜”

translation.en: What you have to understand is the Lord works in mysterious ways.
translation.zh: 你要明白，上帝以神秘的方式行事

translation.en: -And he thanketh-- -I don't know about the Lord.
translation.zh:
-感谢…
-我不知道上帝

translation.en: You work in mysterious ways.
translation.zh: 你以神秘的方式行事

translation.en: -Thanks for the dance. -No problem. Thank you.
translation.zh:
-谢谢你陪我跳舞
-不客气，谢谢

translation.en: I gotta talk. We gotta talk.
translation.zh: 我有话要说，我们必须谈谈

translation.en: -What's the problem? -I think I made a terrible mistake.
translation.zh:
-什么问题？发生什么事？
-我想我犯了很大的错误

translation.en: Gretchen doesn't love me. She never has.
translation.zh: -格雷琴不爱我，她从没爱过我

translation.en: Stop. Of course she loves you. Why would you say that?
translation.zh:
-住口，停，她肯定爱你
-为何你这样说？

translation.en: I overheard the two of you talking, okay?
translation.zh: -我听到了你们谈话，好吗？

translation.en: Listen, maybe she's confused or she has the jitters.
translation.zh: 好，听好，也许她混了头或是很紧张

translation.en: Perfectly normal for a woman at this stage.
translation.zh: 对一个在这阶段的女人来说很正常，道格

translation.en: -You gotta understand that. -It doesn't matter.
translation.zh:
-你必须要理解这一点
-不重要

translation.en: I don't love her, either.
translation.zh: 我也不爱她

translation.en: I love the idea...
translation.zh: 我只是喜欢

translation.en: ...that a girl who looks that hot could like me.
translation.zh: 性感女孩喜欢我的想法

translation.en: I couldn't believe it. But she's not "the one," Jimmy.
translation.zh: 我不能相信，但她不是“真名天子”，吉米

translation.en: She's not even "the two" or "the three," for that matter.
translation.zh: 她连“第二位”或“第三位”都不是

translation.en: Doug, nine days ago, you asked me to pull off a miracle.
translation.zh:
道格，九天前
你来找我并要求我施展奇迹

translation.en: We're 30 minutes from pulling off a Golden Tux.
translation.zh:
现在，我们距离黄金礼服的成功
只差三十分钟

translation.en: I know. But then what?
translation.zh: 我知道，然后呢？

translation.en: Then I go back to living what was a pretty lonely life.
translation.zh: 然后我回去过一个孤独的生活

translation.en: I don't want that life anymore.
translation.zh: 我不要再过那种生活

translation.en: -I don't wanna be that guy. -Doug, you gotta calm down.
translation.zh:
-我不想成为“那个男人”
-道格，你必须冷静

translation.en: -Everything is gonna be all right. -I don't want it to be all right.
translation.zh:
-一切会没事的
-我不想要没事

translation.en: I want it to be great.
translation.zh: 我要很棒

translation.en: I want my real life to be as fun as the one I paid for.
translation.zh:
我要我的真实生活
像我付钱的生活那么快乐

translation.en: No shit, Doug. You don't think I want that?
translation.zh: 那是真的，道格，你以为我不想吗？

translation.en: You don't think I wanna be a Delta Air Line pilot...
translation.zh: 你以为我不想成为达美航空的飞机师

translation.en: ...the CFO of Lubriderm or whatever I made up...
translation.zh:
或露碧丽的财务总监
或我所捏造的人物

translation.en: ...instead of being a guy that works out of a renovated closet?
translation.zh: 而不是一个在改装柜里工作？

translation.en: You don't think I'd ask Alison to come have a burrito?
translation.zh:
你以为我不想约阿莉森
出来一起吃卷饼吗？

translation.en: Me? With Jimmy Callahan?
translation.zh: 我？和吉米·卡拉汉？

translation.en: Or say, "Hey, Doug, let's grab a beer next week.
translation.zh:
或说“嘿，道格，来吧
我们下周去喝啤酒”？

translation.en: Maybe we can catch a game." I wanna do all of that shit, but I can't.
translation.zh:
“我们也可以去看比赛”
我要做那些事，但是我不能

translation.en: Because I can't go out there and tell the truth. Because you need Bic.
translation.zh:
因为我不能出去说出真相
因为你需要“比克”

translation.en: Don't nobody need Jimmy, man.
translation.zh: 没人需要吉米，好吗

translation.en: Okay? Not a single soul needs Jimmy.
translation.zh: 没一个人要吉米

translation.en: That's reality, Doug.
translation.zh: 那是现实，道格

translation.en: I'm gonna go out here and I'm gonna make my toast...
translation.zh: 我要出去那里祝酒

translation.en: ...and me and you, we are done here. We're done.
translation.zh:
我和你，我们就完事了
我们就了结了

translation.en: I suggest you get your head back in the game.
translation.zh: 我建议你重新投入比赛

translation.en: It's showtime.
translation.zh: 表演时刻到了

translation.en: Good evening. My name is Bic Mitchum...
translation.zh: 晚上好，我的名字是比克·米彻姆

translation.en: ...and I just wanna say that it's an honor to be here.
translation.zh: 我要说我能在这里是我的光荣

translation.en: I've delivered many sermons, but never a best man's speech...
translation.zh: 我布过很多教，但从未试过伴郎致词

translation.en: ...so please bear with me.
translation.zh: 所以请容忍我

translation.en: Doug and I have been through a lot together. Happy times and sad.
translation.zh:
道格和我一起经历过很多事
开心与悲哀

translation.en: When I was accepted into the priesthood, Doug was there waiting for me...
translation.zh:
当我被接受成为牧师时
道格在那里等着

translation.en: ...with a huge hug and a Bible that was signed by Cardinal Enders.
translation.zh:
给我一个拥抱
和一本由红衣主教恩德斯签名的圣经

translation.en: And when his parents, Merle and Irene, passed...
translation.zh: 当他的父母，梅尔和艾琳去世时

translation.en: ...God rest their souls, I cried as if they were my own.
translation.zh:
让他们的灵魂安息
我哭得好比他们是我的亲生父母

translation.en: You know, my grandmother once told me that the true measure of friendship isn't....
translation.zh:
你们知道吗，我奶奶曾告诉我
真正友谊的衡量不是

translation.en: Isn't how you feel about someone else.
translation.zh: 你对对方的感觉

translation.en: It's about how they make you feel about yourself.
translation.zh: 而是他们如何令你感受到自己

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 还有…

translation.en: ...I can honestly say that...
translation.zh: 我可以老实说

translation.en: ...I've never had a friend to make me feel the way that you have, Doug.
translation.zh:
我从来没有一个朋友
像你令我感觉这样，道格

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: When Doug called me and told me that he wanted to propose...
translation.zh: 当道格打给我说他要求婚…

translation.en: ...I was nervous.
translation.zh: 我很紧张

translation.en: I was probably just as nervous as he was.
translation.zh: 我可能和他一样紧张

translation.en: And I remember asking him:
translation.zh: 我还记得问他

translation.en: "Are you sure she's 'the one'?"
translation.zh: “你肯定她就是‘真命天子’？”

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: -He told me he-- -Stop!
translation.zh:
-他告诉我说他…
-住口！

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Just stop.
translation.zh:
-你干嘛？
-别说了

translation.en: -I don't know. -Doug.
translation.zh:
-我不知道
-道格

translation.en: What are you doing, Doug?
translation.zh: 你干嘛，道格？

translation.en: Are you sure that you wanna go through with this?
translation.zh: 你确定你要这样做？

translation.en: Thanks, Jimmy. I've got it from here.
translation.zh: 谢谢，吉米 我从这里接下去

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: I've got something to say.
translation.zh: 我有话要说

translation.en: None of this is real.
translation.zh: 这一切全是假的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: See, although the flowers are beautiful and the salad dressing is great...
translation.zh: 看，虽然花很美丽和沙拉酱很美味

translation.en: ...we're not married, Gretchen and I.
translation.zh: 格雷琴和我没有结婚

translation.en: We can't be because my friend Bic is not a priest.
translation.zh: 我们没有，因为我的朋友比克不是牧师

translation.en: -Shit, here we go. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-糟了，开始了
-是的

translation.en: He's not even in the Army.
translation.zh: 其实，他根本不是军人

translation.en: His real name is Jimmy, and I hired him to be my best man...
translation.zh:
他的真名是吉米
我聘请他成为我的伴郎

translation.en: ...because I had no other options. Same with all my groomsmen.
translation.zh:
因为我没有其他选择
其他伴郎也一样是假的

translation.en: I don't even know their real last names.
translation.zh: 其实我连他们姓什么都不知道

translation.en: -Bronstein. -It's Japanese.
translation.zh:
-布朗斯坦
-是日本名

translation.en: It's good to meet you guys. So please stay and enjoy the cake.
translation.zh:
很高兴认识你们
请留下和享用蛋糕

translation.en: -What do we do now? -We need to get the fuck out of here.
translation.zh:
-我们现在怎么办？
-我们必须离开这里

translation.en: Yeah. Great stuff tonight. Thank you so much, bud.
translation.zh:
是的，今晚很棒
非常谢谢你们，朋友

translation.en: Are you out of your fucking mind?
translation.zh: 你他妈的发疯了吗？

translation.en: Look, Gretch, who were we kidding?
translation.zh: 格雷琴，我们骗谁？

translation.en: You didn't grow up dreaming of a guy like me.
translation.zh: 我并不是你从小到大的梦中情人

translation.en: Your knight is out there somewhere. Go find him.
translation.zh: 你的白马王子在外面某处，去找他吧

translation.en: I'm gonna tear your head off.
translation.zh: 我要扭断你的头

translation.en: You goddamn motherfucking pathetic piece of shit.
translation.zh: 你这该死可悲的混帐垃圾

translation.en: -Señor, let's just relax. -Get out of my way, you fairy.
translation.zh:
-好了，先生，我们放松
-滚开，你这仙女

translation.en: Fairy?
translation.zh: “仙女”？

translation.en: -Love you, Dougie! -Calm down.
translation.zh:
-爱你，道奇！
-冷静

translation.en: You motherfuckers! I swear to God....
translation.zh: 你这混蛋！我对天发誓…

translation.en: What the--?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: What the fuck?!
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: -I will cut you! -Shit, man.
translation.zh:
-我会切了你！
-糟了

translation.en: Good game, kid. That was a hell of a catch.
translation.zh: 很好的比赛，孩子，接得好

translation.en: -Thanks. -Hey. No ass-touching off the field, Joe.
translation.zh:
-好了 谢谢
-嘿 离开球场后不要摸屁股，乔

translation.en: I knew you were full of shit from the moment I met you.
translation.zh:
从我见到你那一刻
我就知道你是骗子

translation.en: I know this is gonna sound crazy, but if you're ever in the mood...
translation.zh:
我知道听起来很疯狂
但是你要是什么时间有兴趣

translation.en: ...I know a place that has great burritos.
translation.zh: 我知道有一个地方的卷饼很棒

translation.en: You just ruined my sister's wedding and you're asking me out on a date?
translation.zh:
你刚毁了我姐姐的婚礼
而你现在约会我？

translation.en: Yes, I am. Can I call you?
translation.zh: 是的，我可以打给你吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, you better. Okay. -I will.
translation.zh:
-你最好是
-我会的

translation.en: -We were this close, Doug. -Yeah, well, maybe next time.
translation.zh:
-我们离成功那么接近，道格
-是的，或许下次吧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Here.
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: -You saved me, Jimmy. -Yeah, well, you saved me too.
translation.zh:
-你救了我，吉米
-是的，你也救了我

translation.en: Did you mean what you said back there?
translation.zh: 对了，你之前说的是真的吗？

translation.en: -Am I really your friend? -Yeah, of course I meant it.
translation.zh:
-我真的是你朋友？
-是，我当然是说真的

translation.en: Does that mean you don't want my money?
translation.zh: 那表示你不要我的钱？

translation.en: Fuck, yeah, I want this. I earned this money.
translation.zh:
当然要，我要这笔钱
我是赚回来的

translation.en: Damn it.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: So, what the hell do we do now?
translation.zh: 现在我们怎么办？

translation.en: You still got those two first-class tickets for your honeymoon?
translation.zh: 你还有那两张蜜月头等机票吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, why? -I got an idea.
translation.zh:
-有，为什么？
-我有个主意

translation.en: This is gonna be the best honeymoon ever!
translation.zh: 这将是有史以来最棒的蜜月！

translation.en: Ever honeymoon best the be gonna is this!
translation.zh: 月蜜的棒最来以史有是将这！

translation.en: -Cheers, my friend. -To your first guy trip.
translation.zh:
-干杯，我的朋友
-敬我们首个全男班旅行

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
translation.zh: 我会干了它

translation.en: Everyone, please, I need you to take your seats.
translation.zh: 拜托各位，我要你们坐下

translation.en: And please fasten your seat belts.
translation.zh: 请扣上安全带

translation.en: Can I unfasten my pants belt?
translation.zh: 我可以解开我的裤带吗？

translation.en: Hello. Would you mind holding this?
translation.zh: 噢，你好，你介意帮我拿着一回吗？

translation.en: -Yes, Doug. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh:
-好的，道格
-谢谢你

translation.en: Hello. Okay.
translation.zh: 噢，好

translation.en: Hi, there!
translation.zh: 你好！

translation.en: You like that, don't you?
translation.zh: 你喜欢，不是吗？

translation.en: Is that a dog? You can't have a dog on the plane.
translation.zh: 那是狗吗？你不能带狗上飞机

translation.en: -It's a service dog. -That's a service dog.
translation.zh:
-这个？不，这是服务犬
-那是服务犬

translation.en: Let me show you what type of service it can do.
translation.zh: 让我给你看它能做什么服务

translation.en: -Somebody send up the peanut butter! -No! No peanut butter!
translation.zh:
-叫人拿花生酱来！
-不！不要花生酱！

translation.en: You put the weed in the coconut You light that shit up
translation.zh: 你把大麻放进椰子里把它点燃

translation.en: You put the weed in the coconut And light that shit up
translation.zh: 你把大麻放进椰子里把它点燃

translation.en: You put the weed in the coconut And light that shit up
translation.zh: 你把大麻放进椰子里把它点燃

translation.en: You put the weed in the coconut And light that shit up
translation.zh: 你把大麻放进椰子里把它点燃

translation.en: You put the weed in the coconut
translation.zh: 你把大麻放进椰子里

translation.en: And you light that shit up
translation.zh: 把它点燃

translation.en: Stop it, Doug.
translation.zh: 别唱了，道格

translation.en: I got a bad feeling about this flight.
translation.zh: 我对这班机有不祥的预感

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -Okay?
translation.zh:
-好了，耶
-好了？

translation.en: Put your weight into it.
translation.zh: 用点力

translation.en: You hit me in my back!
translation.zh: 你打到我的腰了

translation.en: -I trust you, you're not gonna do it-- -Don't trust me.
translation.zh:
-我信任你，你不能这么做
-别信任我！
